select.if: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_ROOM R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.FRIEND_EMAIL=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) JOIN CHATTING_CONTENTS C ON(R.ROOM_NO=C.ROOM_NO) WHERE MY_EMAIL=#{email} ORDER BY C.WRITER_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM CHATTING_ROOM R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MY_EMAIL=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) JOIN CHATTING_CONTENTS C ON(R.ROOM_NO=C.ROOM_NO) WHERE FRIEND_EMAIL=#{email} ORDER BY C.WRITER_DATE DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING_CONTENTS VALUES(#{room_no}, #{writer}, #{message}, SYSTIMESTAMP, default)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS WHERE ROOM_NO=#{room_no} ORDER BY CHAT_NO

select.if: SELECT MESSAGE FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN CHATTING_ROOM R ON(C.ROOM_NO=R.ROOM_NO) WHERE ${mytitle}=#{myEmail} AND ${ftitle}=#{fEmail}
SELECT MESSAGE FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN CHATTING_ROOM R ON(C.ROOM_NO=R.ROOM_NO) WHERE ${mytitle}=#{MYemail} AND ${ftitle}=#{FEmail}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.WRITER=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) WHERE ROOM_NO=#{room_no} ORDER BY WRITER_DATE
